PitchRollAidControl
PitchRollAidControl

Contains the logic for the "Pitch/Roll Aid Control" command

Constants
Packet Bytes
CMD_ID

CMD_EF_PITCH_ROLL_AID_CTRL- The MipTypes::Command for this command

FIELD_DATA_BYTE

0xBB  - The Data Field Descriptor byte

Functions
buildCommand_get
static ByteStream buildCommand_get()

Builds the bytes for the "get" command.

buildCommand_set
static ByteStream buildCommand_set(
bool 
enable
)

Builds the bytes for the "set" command.

Parameters
enable
bool

Whether to enable (true) or disable (false) the pitch/roll aiding.
